Package entity

package entity
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ArmoredZombie
    A tough zombie that gains defense against sharp weapons and weak to HEAVY weapons.
    BossZombie
    The powerful Boss Zombie with enrage mechanics.
    Character
    Base class representing any character in the game (Player or Zombie).
    NormalZombie
    A standard zombie enemy with regeneration abilities.
    Player
    Represents the main player character controlled by the user.
    RottenZombie
    A decaying zombie that inflicts poison on attack and weak to SHARP weapons.
    RunnerZombie
    A fast zombie that can increase its dodge chance and weak to GUN weapons.
    Zombie
    Abstract base class for all Zombie enemies.
